text: *Start of any Turn, Round 2 onward:*
Place 2 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
When a friendly NCU Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy to replace that zone's effect with:
*Target 1 enemy Infantry or Cavalry unit (you cannot target Solo units). Roll a die. On a 3+ that unit suffers D3 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of its remaining ranks.*
*Start of any Round, Round 3 onward:*
Each time an enemy Combat Unit Activates this Round, it must perform 1 Morale Test. On a failure, it becomes **Panicked**.
*When an enemy Castle Wall is destroyed:*
Score +1 [VICTORY].
*Start of a friendly Turn, Round 3 onward:*
Target 2 enemy Combat Units. They become **Vulnerable**.
*Start of a any Turn, Round 3 onward:*
Place 2 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
Each time a friendly unit Charges, after rolling Charge Distance Dice, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy. If you do, you may re-roll any Charge Distance Dice.
*When an enemy Castle Wall is destroyed:*
Target each friendly unit within Long Range of the destroyed Castle Wall. They restore D3 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of their destroyed ranks.
*Start of a friendly Turn, Round 4 onward:*

Target 1 enemy Castle Wall. For each of your friendly Combat Units in Long Range of the Castle Wall, it suffers 1 Wound. After the Castle Wall has suffered those Wounds, each friendly Combat Unit within Long Range of the Castle Wall must perform 1 Panic Test.
*Start of a any Turn, Round 2 onward:*
Place 2 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
When a friendly NCU Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy to replace that zone's effect with:
*Target 1 enemy Castle Wall. It suffers 1 Wound.*
*Start of an enemy Turn, Round 3 onward:*
Target 1 enemy NCU. It loses all Abilities until the end of the Round. When that NCU Claims a zone that Round, target 1 enemy Combat Unit. It becomes **Panicked**.
*Start of a friendly Turn, Round 4 onward:*
Target 2 enemy Combat Units. They become **Weakened**.
*Start of any Turn, Round 3 onward:*
Place 2 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
After an enemy completes an Attack, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy and target the Attacker. They become **Weakened**.
*Start of any Turn, Round 3 onward:*
Place 3 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
When an enemy Combat Unit would Activate, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy. Your opponent must choose another Combat Unit to Activate *(if able)*.
*When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:*
Replace that zone's effect with:
*Target 1 unengaged enemy Combat Unit. That unit may not Activate this Round.*
*Start of a friendly Tunr, Round 4 onward:*
Target 1 friendly Castle Wall. Each enemy Combat Unit within Short Range of that Castle Wall suffers D3 Wounds.
*When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:*
Replace that zone's effect with:
*All non-destroyed Castle Walls may perform 1 Ranged Attack Action.*
*Start of any Turn, Round 3 onward:*
Place 2 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
When a friendly unit passes a Morale Test, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy and target that unit. It restores 2 Wounds, +1 Wound for each of its destroyed ranks.
*Start of any Turn, Round 2 onward:*
Place 2 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
When a friendly NCU Claims a zone, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy to replace that zone's effect with:
*Target 1 friendly Castle Wall. It restores 1 Wound.*
*Start of any Turn, Round 4 onward:*
Place 3 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
When a friendly Castle Wall is Attacked, after Attack Dice are rolled, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy to block 1 Hit *(this may be repeated)*.
*Start of any Turn, Round 3 onward:*
Place 2 Order tokens on this Strategy after it is revealed.
When a friendly unit is Attacked with a Melee Attack, before Attack Dice are rolled, you may remove 1 Order token from this Strategy to have your unit gain **Counterstrike** for this Turn:
*For each Miss, the Attacker suffers 1 Hit.*
*When a friendly NCU Claims a zone:*
Replace that zone's effect with:
*Redeploy 1 previously Destroyed friendly Combat Unit anywhere in Short Range of a Flank table edge, unactivated.*
